# Cased CD - Deployment Infrastructure
# Prevent search engine indexing of internal deployment tools

User-agent: *
Disallow: /

# Security and audit trails should never be indexed
Disallow: /audit-trail
Disallow: /rbac
Disallow: /notifications
Disallow: /user-info
Disallow: /applications
Disallow: /repositories
Disallow: /clusters
Disallow: /projects

# Allow security.txt to be discovered
Allow: /.well-known/security.txt
Allow: /security.txt
